document_data.name: Murbryn
document_data.mainbody: '''Murbryn''' was a warrior for the [[Cult of the Dragon]] in the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Relationships: [[Thoadrin]] and [[Curthryn]] were aware of his name.
document_data.History: In late {{yearlink|1357}}, [[Thoadrin]] led a force of [[Cult of the Dragon]] warriors to harry [[Orthil Voldovan]]'s caravan, aiming to capture one of her passengers, [[Shandril Shessair]]. During one of their ambushes, his underling Curthryn related that Murbryn may have been one of the dead.
